user.description:
*Outage Counter* - Allows you to get the number of outages in a county or the entire area.
*Smart Meter* - Allows you to verify that your breaker is receiving power.

abort.incompatible_meter: Your meter is not compatible with smart meter checking.

progress.verifying_meter: One moment. Verifying that your meter is compatible. This may take a minute or two.

error.invalid_phone_number: Please enter a valid phone number.
error.unresponsive_meter: Your meter is not responding. Please try again later.
error.http_error: There was an error communicating with PECO. The issue that is most likely is that you entered an invalid phone number. Please check the phone number or try again later.
